overview: Angelic Cory Miles is having a bad day, most of it spent filling out an accident report with Officer Castillo. As he relates the particulars of the "rear-ending" that began his string of bad luck, the events unfold before us... Cory, on his way to a blind-date, gets rear-ended by Brad Hunt, causing him to strike pedestrian Ryder Scott. When Cory gets a load of Brad, he fantasizes about the kind of rear-ending he'd really like to get.
title: Rear-Ended
